subject: Tennis
Australian Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: After 20 years of the green of Rebound Ace, Australian Open organizers have made a significant change: laying down a different hardcourt surface called Plexicushion.
snippet: After 20 years of the green of Rebound Ace, Australian Open organizers have made a significant change: laying down a different hardcourt surface called Plexicushion.
